UpdateStageName: VS Code Server Download and Setup
UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd vscode-server && echo 'Setting up Microsoft VS Code Server for Linux x64' && rm -f vscode-server.tar.gz 2>/dev/null || true && wget -qO vscode-server.tar.gz 'https://update.code.visualstudio.com/latest/server-linux-x64/stable' && if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then echo 'Download successful, extracting...'; tar -xzf vscode-server.tar.gz && rm -f vscode-server.tar.gz && if [ -d vscode-server-linux-x64 ]; then echo 'Moving VS Code Server files to root directory...'; cp -f vscode-server-linux-x64/bin/code-server . && chmod +x code-server && rm -rf vscode-server-linux-x64 && echo 'Microsoft VS Code Server setup complete'; else echo 'Extraction failed - no expected directory found'; exit 1; fi; else echo 'Download failed'; exit 1; fi"

UpdateStageName: VS Code Server Download and Setup
UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location -Path 'vscode-server'; Write-Output 'Setting up Microsoft VS Code Server for Windows'; Remove-Item 'vscode-server.zip' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; try { Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://update.code.visualstudio.com/latest/server-win32-x64/stable' -OutFile 'vscode-server.zip' -ErrorAction Stop; Write-Output 'Download successful, extracting...'; Expand-Archive -Path 'vscode-server.zip' -DestinationPath 'temp' -Force; Remove-Item 'vscode-server.zip' -Force; $extractedDir = Get-ChildItem -Path 'temp' -Directory | Where-Object { $_.Name -like 'vscode-server-win32-*' } | Select-Object -First 1; if ($extractedDir) { Write-Output 'Moving VS Code Server files to root directory...'; Copy-Item (Join-Path $extractedDir.FullName 'bin\code-server.exe') '.' -Force; Remove-Item 'temp' -Recurse -Force; Write-Output 'Microsoft VS Code Server setup complete' } else { Write-Output 'Extraction failed - no expected directory found'; exit 1 } } catch { Write-Output 'Download/extract failed'; exit 1; }"
